column1: #Text=is in the southwest of Baden-Württemberg , right in the south of Germany .
#Text=( BSL ; MLH ; EAP ) near Basel ( but on French soil ) has flights from many cities in Europe including from budget carriers .
#Text=Travellers from further away may find it cheaper to fly to Zurich and take a train from the airport there to Basel SBB and thence to Lörrach by train .
#Text=Trains run from Basel SBB to Lörrach every half hour .
#Text=There is also a sleeper train to Hamburg with tickets sold by Flixtrain
#Text=There are train services from the central station every half hour to Basel ( leaving at one minute past the hour and half hour ) .
#Text=Trains can also be used to get to the southern suburb of Stetten or the northwestern suburb of Steinen .
#Text=There is also a bus service around Lörrach but buses are not as frequent as trains .
#Text=However , most areas are within walking distance of the central city .
#Text=From Stetten , the Swiss border is in easy walking distance and the number 6 tram runs from the border into Basel .

#Text=( Burg Rötteln ) , 79541 Lörrach-Haagen ( Bus no . 16 to Röttelnweiler plus 15 minutes walk or about 50 minutes walk from the main station ) , ☏ +49762156494 , ✉ info@burgruine-roetteln.de . open 10:00 - 18:00 .
#Text=The fortification was one of the most powerful in the southwest , and today is the third largest castle ruin in Baden .
#Text=The outer bailey is free and open year round .
#Text=The inner bailey and museum is open each day in summer and on weekends at other times .
#Text=In the outer bailey there is a café and a beer garden . € 2.50 adults ; € 1 children .
#Text=There are views over Lörrach , Basel in Switzerland , and parts of France from Obertüllingen on a hill directly west of the Lörrach suburb of Stetten .
#Text=is 13 km north and has large stork nests on top of several buildings , most picturesquely on a narrow church spire .
#Text=Look for a witch 's house ( marked with ' Hexe ' ) - if you put 50 cents in the slot the shutters will open and a mechanical witch appears to tell you ( in German ) about her life .
#Text=is a neighbouring town which can be reached walking through the Black Forest .
#Text=It has its own castle , Inzlingen Castle ( Wasserschloss Inzlingen ) .
#Text=Go for a walk through the Black Forest , which surrounds the town .
#Text=There are market days on Tuesday , Thursday and Saturday , with the latter being by far the largest .
#Text=( youth hostel ) . cheaper , and close to the Black Forest , but is about half an hour 's walk or a bus ride from town .
#Text=There are a number of apartments catering to travellers , but no central website for booking them .
